Detailed Description

SimpleSocket.h provides simple socket interface as needed by CommandSender.h and EventListner.h to interface with the Unified Simulator for Self-Reconfigurable Robots (USSR).

Author:
David Johan Christensen, Modular Robotics Lab, University of Southern Denmark
Note:
This software is distributed under the BSD open-source license.

Function Documentation

void ss_close ( int  sockfd  ) 

Close the socket.

Parameters:
sockfd the id of the socket to close.

int ss_connect ( char *  host,
int  port 
)

Connect to a socket, blocks until connection is made, terminates process is no connection is achieved.

Parameters:
host typically LOCALHOST
port any free socket port e.g. 1234
Returns:
sockfd the id of the socket which was connected to.

int ss_receive ( char *  buffer,
int  sockfd 
)

Receive data from a socket, blocks until data received (newline terminated).

Parameters:
buffer the buffer to put received data into.
sockfd the id of the socket to read from.
Returns:
numbytes the number of bytes received.

void ss_send ( char *  data,
int  length,
int  sockfd 
)

Send data to a socket, blocks until data send. Data must be terminated with newline.

Parameters:
data the data to be send.
length the number of bytes to be send.
sockfd the id of the socket to send data to.
